attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It's cruel and unjust!

There are alternatives!

They government have said they keep the suffering of animals to "acceptable levels". How is any suffering acceptable?

If you have a pet, care for animals, or see animals as beings that feel pain, please sign this petition!

rejection.details: Please supply full name and address information.
reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
